items.sentence: About how long does it take to get to Boston from here?
Please don't mention that Tom was the one who did this.
If I get there first, I'll tell Tom you're coming, too.
Only time will tell what the world has in store for us.
Time passes quickly when we're doing something we like.
If Tom had gotten Mary's advice, he would've succeeded.
For me, skiing is by far more interesting than skating.
Since Tom ran so fast, Mary couldn't catch up with him.
I'm going to empty this cabinet so that you can use it.
I'm going to turn on the heater because it's very cold.
What can be said about it that hasn't been said before?
I wonder whether I should tell Tom about what happened.
What's something you eat every day or almost every day?
I had no idea that Tom didn't know how to speak French.
I had no idea that there was a bank so near your house.
I hope that somebody's there to unlock the door for us.
I hope that you were kidding about leaving at midnight.
If you don't have other plans, let's go out for dinner.
Please get out of the way so this lady can get through.
Tom was caught in the rain and his new suit got ruined.
